is the main road in and out of the region.

The Sunrise Trail is a scenic motorway which passes through many of the coastal towns and villages in the area. The Trail is known for its stunning ocean views and seaside farms. It is the access route for several attractions. These include the Cape George Lighthouse (The park at the lighthouse features several kilometres of hiking trails), Ballantyne's Cove Bluefin Tuna Interpretive Centre, and the Arisaig Lighthouse. It also passes through
, home of the Antigonish Highland Games.
